flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project will use available off the shelf parts as well as fabricated items. A knowledge of steam safety, machining, and welding is required.
guide.introduction_rendered: This project will use available off the shelf parts as well as fabricated items. A knowledge of steam safety, machining, and welding is required.
guide.summary: Converting a human powered quadricycle to steam power using an existing quadricycle frame and modding the drivertrain, adding a steam engine and coal fired boiler and all associated hardware.
guide.title: Steam Quadricycle
